mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GATHERING_BD (GATHERING_BD_NUM, GATHERING_BD_TITLE, GATHERING_BD_CONTENT, GATHERING_BD_CATEGORY,MEMBER_ID,GATHERING_NUM,GATHERING_BD_DATE,GATHERING_BD_PICTURE ) VALUES (#{board_num, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{board_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_num, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{board_date, jdbcType=DATE},#{board_picture, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
